com.dbteku.orbit.core

Class World

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dbteku.orbit.core.World
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.dbteku.orbit.interfaces.FxLaunchListener

    public class World
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.dbteku.orbit.interfaces.FxLaunchListener
    This class when extended allows you to create a world to run simulations.
